00005 #define BkmmSearchOpsBelowThisIgnoreValue 0x0100
00006 #define BkmmSearchOpNumberMask 0x00f0 // not used at this time
00007 #define BkmmSearchOpDateMask   0xf000 // not used at this time

00010         BkmmCriterionTypeString,
00011         BkmmCriterionTypeDate,
00012         BkmmCriterionTypeNumber,
00013         BkmmCriterionTypeBool
00014 } ;

00016 enum BkmmCriterionValidFor {
00017         BkmmCriterionValidForContainer = 1<<0,
00018         BkmmCriterionValidForBookmark = 1<<1
00019 } ;

00021 enum BkmmSearchFor {
00022         BkmmSearchForBookmarks = 1<<0,
00023         BkmmSearchForFolders = 1<<1
00024 } ;
00025 
00026 enum BkmmSearchOp {
00027         BkmmSearchOpDontCare = 0,
00028 
00029         // for BOOLs only:
00030         BkmmSearchOpIsYes = 1<<1, // 0x2
00031         BkmmSearchOpIsNo = 2<<1,  // 0x4
00032 
00033         // for NSDates only:
00034         BkmmSearchOpLast60Minutes = 1<<4,
00035         BkmmSearchOpLast24Hours = 2<<4,
00036         BkmmSearchOpLast7Days = 3<<4,
00037         BkmmSearchOpLast30Days = 4<<4,
00038         BkmmSearchOpLast90Days = 5<<4,
00039         BkmmSearchOpLast365Days = 6<<4,
00040         
00041         // for numbers only:
00042         BkmmSearchOpEquals = 1<<8,
00043         BkmmSearchOpLessThan = 2<<8,
00044         BkmmSearchOpGreaterThan = 3<<8,
00045         BkmmSearchOpLessThanOrEqualTo = 4<<8,
00046         BkmmSearchOpGreaterThanOrEqualTo= 5<<8,
00047         
00048         // for strings only:
00049         BkmmSearchOpCaseInsensitive = 1<<12,
00050         BkmmSearchOpContains = 1<<13,
00051         BkmmSearchOpIs = 2<<13,
00052         BkmmSearchOpBeginsWith = 3<<13,
00053         BkmmSearchOpEndsWith = 4<<13    
00054 } ;
00055

00061                 enum BkmmCriterionType type ;
00062                 enum BkmmSearchOp op ;
00063                 int value ;
00064 }
